author: potuz
content: <@388610194608750595> I'm implementing withdrawals on prysm right now. What's the design decision for MEV boost around Capella? I plan to open a branch already this weekend for testing. What would you need to also test with the builder?

author: metachris_
content: first step is to decide how to handle the changed payloads in the builder-specs -- whether we add them backwards compatible, or as new API versions (i.e. getPayload/sendBlindedBlock). cc/ <@543900561460822016> <@539495253418180618> <@592004585506340885>

author: metachris_
content: to test the full flow with the builder network, it requires (a) updating the builder specs, (b) updating the types, (c) updating mev-boost to use new types/api routes, (d) create a custom capella branch of mev-boost, (e) possibly spin up a testnet capella relay+builder.
